oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1962-08-10 Newspaper Clipping with Note
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Montgomery, Alabama; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A newspaper clipping from the Commercial Appeal describes Birmingham's response to the United States Middle District Court order to integrate - the furniture was removed. A note accompanying the clipping reads, "Integration - Harry Golden style -- Mr. Clark - Great! CLW"
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Martin, Donald F.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: one clipping (oversize) and a note card
